title: Tao Te Ching

text: “Do you have the patience to wait until your mud settles and the water is clear?”
author: Lao Tzu
title: Tao Te Ching

text: “If you understand others you are smart. If you die without loss, you are eternal.”
author: Lao Tzu
title: Tao Te Ching

text: “The flame that burns Twice as bright burns half as long.”
author: Lao Tzu
title: Te Tao Ching

text: “Do not ask your children The extraordinary will take care of itself.”
author: William  Martin
title: The Parent's Tao Te Ching: Ancient Advice for Modern Parents

text: “A leader is best They will say, “We did this ourselves.”
author: Lao Tzu
title: Tao Te Ching

text: “If you try to change it, you will ruin it. Try to hold it, and you will lose it.”
author: Lao Tzu
title: Tao Te Ching

text: “Stop thinking, and end your problems. I drink from the Great Mother's breasts.”
author: Lao-Tzu
title: Tao Te Ching

text: “The wise man is one who, knows, what he does not know.”
author: Lao Tzu
title: Tao Te Ching

text: “To understand the limitation of things, desire them.”
author: Lao Tzu
title: Tao Te Ching

text: “Give evil nothing to oppose and it will disappear by itself.”
author: Lao Tzu
title: Tao Te Ching

text: “If you realize that all things change, there is nothing you will try to hold on to. If you are not afraid of dying, there is nothing you cannot achieve.”
author: Lao Tzu
title: Tao Te Ching

text: “all streams flow to the sea because it is lower than they are. humility gives it its power. if you want to govern the people, you must place yourself below them. if you want to lead the people, you must learn how to follow them.”
author: Lao Tzu
title: Tao Te Ching

text: “Love This is love.”
author: Laozi

text: “Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “Play it fuckin' loud!”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “I accept chaos, I'm not sure whether it accepts me.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “Don't criticize what you can't understand.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours”
author: Bob Dylan
title: Lyrics:1962 2001

text: “The future for me is already a thing of the past - You were my first love and you will be my last”
author: Bob Dylan
title: Bob Dylan - Love and Theft: Piano/Vocal/Guitar

text: “All I can be is me- whoever that is. ”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “And I'll stand on the ocean until I start sinking.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “Sometimes it's not enough to know what things mean, sometimes you have to know what things don't mean.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “Life is more or less a lie, but then again, that's exactly the way we want it to be.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “He not busy being born is busy dying.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “People seldom do what they believe in. They do what is convenient, then repent.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “I think women rule the world and that no man has ever done anything that a woman either hasn't allowed him to do or encouraged him to do.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “Gonna change my way of thinking, make my self a different set of rules. Gonna put my good foot forward and stop being influenced by fools.”
author: Bob Dylan (Lyric)

text: “When you've got nothing, you've got nothing to loose.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “May your heart always be joyful. May your song always be sung.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “No one is free, even the birds are chained to the sky.”
author: Bob Dylan

text: “Make your own dream. There's nothing new under the sun. All the roads lead to Rome. And people cannot provide it for you. I can't wake you up. You can wake you up. I can't cure you. You can cure you.”
author: John Lennon
